name: digimon
description:
agumon codes for gamefox

what you have to do is download firefox and then get gamefox. open up notepad and put in this code and then save it 'digimon' or w/e(i'll post it on the end of this message) then go to

tools > gamefox > style > import stylesheet

and then open up the digimon file.

you can go to

http://userstyles.org/styles/17469

and click "show code" to get up to 493 (so you don't have to put them all in) instead of just 30. i only did 30 so far but i need to keep copying and pasting the URL.
